project1.title: Website for a Web Studio
project1.description: This website was developed using Next.js, LenisScroll for smooth scrolling, and GSAP for scroll-based animations. The project also incorporates React Hook Form and Yup for form validation, with data submission to Email/Telegram implemented via Express.

project2.title: Website for a celebrity makeup artist
project2.description: This website includes over 15 pages, featuring a photo gallery for convenient portfolio browsing. The project is performance-oriented, achieving a score of over 92 points in Performance metrics.

project3.title: Todo list
project3.description: Built on Next.js 15.1, this project integrates Next Intl and supports theme switching via cookies. Performance optimization techniques, such as memo and useMemo, were used to minimize re-renders. Zustand manages the state, tasks are stored in localStorage, and task filtering is included.

experience.title: Experience
experience.text1: Since 2023, I have worked at a web studio where I developed client interfaces for various projects, ensuring high quality and user-friendly interactions. In close collaboration with the designer, I implemented responsive designs, following Figma layouts precisely. My primary contribution was creating the frontend, adhering to technical requirements and enhancing UX. I was also actively involved in website optimization and testing new features.
experience.text2: To develop adaptive and cross-browser websites, I used Next.js and implemented creative animations using libraries like GSAP and Motion, enhancing visual effects and user interactions. For infrastructure stability and scalability, I utilized Docker to deploy websites on VPS, enabling efficient project management and ensuring their seamless operation.

todoDescription.title: Project Description:
todoDescription.text: ToDo List is a task management application implemented in Next.js using the App Router. It provides an interactive user interface with filtering, animations, and local data storage.

descriptionList.item1: Creation of global state using Zustand for centralized data management.
descriptionList.item2: Adding, editing, and deleting tasks with immediate state updates without re-rendering the entire list.
descriptionList.item3: Separation of logical (realCompleted) and animated (animationCompleted) states to ensure smooth transitions and responsive interface.
descriptionList.item4: LocalStorage is used to persist task data and current filters, allowing the state to be restored after a page reload.

descriptionList.item1: Controlled components for data entry ensure validation and prevent errors when adding tasks.
descriptionList.item2: Dynamic generation of task list with support for responsive display and filtering.
descriptionList.item3: Saving the current filter in LocalStorage allows user preferences to be preserved upon page reload or revisits.
descriptionList.item4: Mobile device support and responsive design for comfortable use on various screen sizes.
descriptionList.item5: Intuitive buttons for managing tasks and filtering to enhance usability.

descriptionList.item1: Animations for task addition and deletion, improving visual feedback on list changes.
descriptionList.item2: 500 ms delay when switching task states to ensure synchronous completion of animations and state changes.
descriptionList.item3: Transition effects and smooth changes during task filtering to increase interactivity.
descriptionList.item4: Using Motion for flexible animation configuration, including element fade-in and fade-out.

descriptionList.item1: Dynamic filtering of tasks by status (active, completed, all tasks) with immediate interface response.
descriptionList.item2: Saving the selected filter in LocalStorage for user convenience and restoring preferences upon revisits.
descriptionList.item3: Support for combined filtering, including search and sorting by date added or completion status.

results.title: Project Summary
results.text: The ToDo List project is a modern task management application built on Next.js using Zustand, Motion, and TailwindCSS.

list.item1: <bold>Flexible state management</bold> with Zustand and data persistence in LocalStorage for longevity.
list.item2: <bold>Smooth animations</bold> and interactivity with Motion, enhancing the user experience.
list.item3: <bold>Responsive and intuitive design</bold> based on TailwindCSS for ease of use on any device.
